abstracts.cdata!:
The activities financed by this World
            Bank project allowed the Government of Dominican Republic to
            take important measures to re-launch reforms in the
            electricity sector. The project provided important studies
            and activities that helped to improve the capabilities and
            performance of key institutions in this sector, including
            the fostering of a whole area of expertise on renewable
            energy and energy efficiency.
